def handle_quote_shortcut(self, event: QKeyEvent):
        is_double_quote = event.key() in (Qt.Key_QuoteDbl, Qt.Key_Apostrophe)
        if is_double_quote:
            cursor = self.text_edit.textCursor()
            if cursor.hasSelection():
                selected_text = cursor.selectedText()
                start_pos = cursor.selectionStart()
                end_pos = cursor.selectionEnd()

                if event.key() == Qt.Key_QuoteDbl:  # 处理双引号
                    cursor.insertText(f'"{selected_text}"')
                    cursor.setPosition(start_pos + 1)
                    cursor.setPosition(end_pos + 1, Qt.TextCursor.KeepAnchor)  # 注意这里的修正
                else:  # 单引号逻辑类似
                    cursor.insertText(f"'{selected_text}'")
                    cursor.setPosition(start_pos + 1)
                    cursor.setPosition(end_pos + 1, Qt.TextCursor.KeepAnchor)

                self.text_edit.setTextCursor(cursor)
